gurmukhi: ਰਚਨਾ ਚਰਿਤ੍ਰ ਚਿਤ੍ਰ ਬਿਸਮ ਬਚਿਤ੍ਰਪਨ ਘਟ ਘਟ ੲੇਕ ਹੀ ਅਨੇਕ ਹੁੲਿ ਦਿਖਾੲਿ ਹੈ
transliteration: Rachanaa Charitr Chitr Bisam Bachitrapana , Ghat Ghat Ayk Hee Anayk Hui Dikhaai Hai ?
translation: Creation of the wonderful play of the creator's creation is amazing and astonishing. He alone resides in all in several shapes and forms.

gurmukhi: ੳੁਤ ਤੇ ਲਿਖਤ ੲਿਤ ਪਢਤ ਅੰਤਰਗਤਿ ੲਿਤਹੂ ਤੇ ਲਿਖਿ ਪ੍ਰਤਿ ੳੁਤਰ ਪਠਾੲੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Out Tay Likhat It Paddhat Antaragati , Itahoo Tay Likhi Prati Outar Patthaaay Hai ?
translation: Just as a letter is written by somebody who sends it to someone in another city, it is read there and after understanding it sends back a reply.

gurmukhi: ੳੁਤ ਤੇ ਸਬਦ ਰਾਗ ਨਾਦ ਕੋ ਪ੍ਰਸੰਨੁ ਕਰਿ ੲਿਤ ਸੁਨਿ ਸਮਝਿ ਕੈ ੳੁਤ ਸਮਝਾੲੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Out Tay Sabad Raag Naad Ko Prasannu Kari , It Souni Samajhi Kai Out Samajhaaay Hai ?
translation: Just as a singer sings a song in a mode and tune that pleases someone who understands it and educate others about it.

gurmukhi: ਰਤਨ ਪਰੀਖ੍ਰਯ੍ਰਯਿਾ ਪੇਖਿ ਪਰਮਿਤਿ ਕੈ ਸੁਨਾਵੈ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੰਧਿ ਮਿਲੇ ਅਲਖ ਲਖਾੲੇ ਹੈ ||੨੭੫||
transliteration: Ratan Pareekhyyiaa Paykhi Paramiti Kai Sounaavai , Gurmukhi Sandhi Milay Alakh Lakhaaay Hai ?275?
translation: Just as a jewel evaluator inspects a jewel, learns about its characteristics and educate others about it, so would a Guru oriented Sikh who has become one with True Guru by virtue of His teachings and words, he alone can brief and educate others about the
